cases.title: Filtering "Business suits" (e.g beige suits, 44 size)
cases.preconditions:
1\. Go to https://teodor.bg/

2\.The “Suits” page is loaded

steps.action: Click on categories drop-down menu
steps.expected_result: The drop down menu expands

steps.action: Select business suits
steps.expected_result: The user is redirect successfully to “Business Suits” page

steps.action: Click on collor drop-down menu
steps.expected_result: The drop down menu expands

steps.action: Select Beige collor
steps.expected_result: The user is redirect successfully to “Business Suits with beige collor” page

steps.action: Click on size drop-down menu
steps.expected_result: The drop down menu expands

steps.action: Select “44” size
steps.expected_result: 1\.The user can see all results with beige suits with size "44".

cases.title: Filtering "Business suits" (e.g black suits, 64 size, regular fit)
cases.preconditions:
1\. Go to https://teodor.bg/

2\.The “Suits” page is loaded

steps.action: Click on categories drop-down menu
steps.expected_result: The drop down menu expands

steps.action: Select business suits
steps.expected_result: The user is redirect successfully to “Business Suits” page

steps.action: Click on collor drop-down menu
steps.expected_result: The drop down menu expands

steps.action: Select Black collor
steps.expected_result: The user is redirect successfully to “Business Suits with black collor” page

steps.action: Click on cut drop-down menu
steps.expected_result: The drop down menu expands

steps.action: Select Regular fit
steps.expected_result: The user is redirect successfully to “Busness Suits wtih black collor and Regular fit” page

steps.action: Select “66” size
steps.expected_result: The user can see all results with black suits with size "64" and Regular fit.

cases.title: Testing that the user can filter "Ceremonial Suits" (e.g blue color, Slim fit, 56 size, tissue, price)
cases.preconditions:
1\. Go to https://teodor.bg/

2\.The “Suits” page is loaded

steps.action: Select “Ceremonial Suits” from categories drop-down menu
steps.expected_result: The user is redirect successfully to “Ceremonial Suits”

steps.action: Select Blue collor from color drop-down menu
steps.expected_result: The user is redirect successfully to “Ceremonial Suits” with (blue color)

steps.action: Select Slim fit from cut drop-down menu
steps.expected_result: The user is redirect successfully to “Ceremonial Suits” wtih (blue color and Slim fit)

steps.action: Select “56” size from Size drop-down menu
steps.expected_result: The user is redirect successfully to “Ceremonial suits” with (blue color, Slim fit and 56 size)

steps.action: Select Wool from tissue drop-down menu
steps.expected_result: The user is redirect successfully to “Ceremonial suits” with (blue color, Slim fit, 56 size, wool fabric)”

steps.action: Select Price from BGN 200 to BGN 350
steps.expected_result: 1\.The user is redirect successfully to  “Ceremonial suits” with (blue collor, Slim fit, 56 size, wool fabric, price between BGN 200 and BGN 350).
